amendment.description: An amendment numbered 59 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to prohibit the use of funds to extend "Temporary Protected Status" to any national of Honduras, which was initially granted to Honduran nationals in 1999.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 222 (Roll no. 296).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 222 (Roll no. 296).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
